text: Mohammed Ahmed Ali Boqshan or Mohammed Boqshan (born 10 March 1994) is a Yemeni footballer who currently plays as a defender for the Yemen national football team. ==Career== Boqshan made his international debut for Yemen in 2012 against Saudi Arabia during the 2012 WAFF Championships group stage in a 1–0 loss. He scored his first international goal against Pakistan during the 2018 World Cup qualifiers in which Yemen ran out 3–1 winners. ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Yemen's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" ! # !!
